profile:
A & Wes Tile has been serving the greater Vancouver area since 1994. We specialize in bathroom and kitchen renovations including tile and stone installation.  
Contact us for a free quote today!
p: (604) 657-0343
e: aandwestile@gmail.com
service_area: West side Vancouver, North Vancouver, West Vancouver and the rest of Greater Vancouver. Burnaby, New Westminister, Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam.
services:
-Removing existing tiled floors, walls, vanity, counter-top
-Installing; sub-floor (plywood, galvanized metal lath, anti fracture membrane etc.)  waterproof drywall, waterproof membrane,
shower curb, custom shower base, custom shower niches,
custom shower seat built to specific requirements of the client,
heating mat or cable. grab bars.
- Repairing shower and bathtub enclosure walls (correcting studs
  and installing backing for shower fixtures).
- Repairing floors for tiles installation
- And more specific when required by client.
specialities:
-Custom build bathrooms (walk in showers)
- Large format tiles installation (natural stone tile or porcelain etc.)
- Fireplace tile (natural stone or porcelain)
- Electrically heated floor

profile: Micom Tileworks has been in the tile industry for many years and i have worked as a tile setter in Europe and Canada.  My goal is to provide the customer with good advice, help with selections and meticulous quality work. The products i use are considered high end products which not only gives you a beautiful result but also a solid tile installation that will last you a long time. I work with all ceramic, porcelain, glass and all natural stone tiles and have a extensive knowledge in all tile applications. My focus is residential work so i can work together with the customer to make their vision come true. Over the years i obtained certifications in many tile, in-floor heating, waterproofing and custom tile showerbase products. That is besides the awards Micom Tileworks has won over the years for great customer service and quality work. Give us a call, send a text, email us at micomtileworks@live.com or feel free to go to the website at www.micomtileworks.com for more info about the company.
service_area: Langley, Surrey, Delta, South Surrey, Aldergrove, Cloverdale, Coquitlam, Burnaby, Port Coquitlam, Maple Ridge, Port Moody, New Westminster, Ladner, White Rock, Abbotsford, Vancouver and so on. We go where we are needed.
products: All ceramic, porcelain, glass and natural stones like slate, travertine, marble and granite. From mosaics and small pebbles to very big tiles.
services: We tile everything from Shower/tub-surround walls, tile shower-bases, all floors, fireplaces, backsplashes, patios etc.  We do all the prep work to get everything ready for tile from tearouts, drywalling the areas to be tiled, new subfloors, AF membranes, waterproofing, and sealers.
brands: We use many brands of tiles but also work with heating and waterproofing products like Nuheat, Thermaflex, schluter products, Redgard, HPG paintable membranes, grout sealers  etc.
specialities: Tiles are our specialty and passion.we have a extensive knowledge in all tile applications and products. With many years of experience complete with European training we can provide you with meticulous work. We only use high end products to provide you with a solid job.
name: Micom Tileworks

profile:
Surface Deep Solutions is committed to sustainable construction and to minimizing the impact we have on the environment. High quality cosmetic repair is a sustainable option, it’s far more environmentally friendly, not to mention cost-effective, to repair rather than replace – and that goes for both refurbishment and new build projects.

How we can help
Replacements cost more in terms of money, time and labour, and can significantly delay delivery of a project. Our cosmetic repairs help keep projects on time, on budget, and improve waste management, helping to achieve and maintain sustainable construction.


Save Money
Instead of replacing, refinish your products to save YOU money!  

Repair all types of surfaces
We can repair all types of surfaces including granite, laminate, fiberglass, enamel, cast iron, metal or wood.  

Friendly Staff
Built on a solid foundation of experience, meticulous attention to detail, superb workmanship and exceptional customer service

ECO-Friendly
We help prevent old bathtubs, tiles, counter-tops and sinks from entering landfill

Why Choose to Repair
Eliminate the expense and the disruption of replacement work with top-notch repair and restoration services from Surface Deep Solutions. By doing so, you could take advantage of up to 80% in substantial savings. Contact Us for your FREE estimate.

Our Values
Quality – We are committed to providing high quality service for all of our customers.
Creativity – We are continuously inventing new ways of repairing surfaces that are both cost effective and environmentally friendly.
Workmanship – We thrive on providing high quality workmanship for all of our customers.
services:
We can help you Repair Instead of Replace. To save YOU money!

We provide services for YOU, manufacturers, realtors, restoration, development and management companies.
 

We specialize in many types of surface  repairs such as:
 

• Counter tops/granite,laminate. Stains, chips and scratches.

• Tubs/sinks/showers whether it is on fiberglass, enamel or cast iron.

• Vinyl window casings/ sliding glass door vinyl frames. Chips,cracks and holes.

• Appliances – Stove/oven chips.

• Metal/wood doors. Dents or scratches.

• Elevator panels, laminate, lino and hardwood floor
name: Surface Deep Solutions

profile:
Hi there! Thank you for checking us out :) Here's a-little bit about us, we are a locally owned and operated company specializing in tile, stone installations and home renovations. We are here to help you make your home dreams a reality while ensuring that your project does not become a nightmare. We aim to guide your project through painless and stress free process by staying on budget, keeping our sites clean, being respectful of you and your neighbours, and walking you through every step of the process so you are confident and happy with your project.

We do tile and stone installation for new builds, bathroom and kitchen remodeling and renovations, as well as other home improvement projects. We are also certified to install Dekton and Silestone. Contact us today for your free estimate or consultation or if you have any questions about how we can help you!

To connect with us, call 778-968-0991 or email us at info@postmoderndesign.ca with details of the services you are looking for.

profile:
Welcome to Prime Kitchen and Bath where we specialize in making your renovation dreams come true! We offer a variety of Home Renovation services including:


Home Additions
Kitchen Renovations
Bathroom Renovations
Basement Renovations
Complete Condo Renovations
Custom Home Building

Prime Kitchen and Bath offers a complete process from start to finish with each project. We start out by a free consultation, followed through with a free estimate. Once the estimate is accepted we then start on the design stage. Once approved by you, the homeowner, your dreams start to turn into a reality. 


Prime Kitchen and Bath has all the right professionals to do each and every job. Hiring the right Contractor can save you thousands of dollars, because the right contractor does things right the first time... Every time. Keeping your project running smoothly with completion dates on time and within budget.


We operate on the best foundation a business can operate on, that is Honesty and Integrity. We stand behind everything we do and everything we say. We guarantee our work and that is what gives you, our Number 1 priority: Confidence and Peace of Mind.


WE PROVIDE SERVICES TO THE ENTIRE LOWER MAINLAND OF B.C. 


No budget is too big or to small. Here at Prime Kitchen and Bath we will work with you on your budget. Please fill in the Request for a Free Quote form if you're interested, and one of our sales members will contact you within 24 hours and set up a consultation.


Prime Kitchen and Bath is a member of the National Kitchen & Bath Association.

profile:
If you are looking to have high quality, high-end tile installation at your place, you came to the right business. 

Our company is proud and not timid to proclaim its high quality and responsibility in satisfying its valuable clients over their projects 

We have seen the tile industry progress significantly over the years. We have kept up with the current trends like larger size tiles, different shapes, textures, different mosaics as well as the way tile is being made – including porcelain, tumbled and natural stone tiles, metal and glass liners, and decorative accents.

Larger tiles with smaller grout joints are a more popular choice, especially with today’s working generation. Many of the newer tiles being produced today have textures that make them more slip-resistant.
